Reserve a table slideshow start stop playing Slide 1 content Slide 2 content Slide 3 content previous slide next slide amazing house sandwiches traditionally refined, adventurous and unique Our Menu Host Your Next Celebration with us group reservations and parties Book Now a private party happy hours and specials treat yourself All Specials Unforgettable Celebrations Group reservations and parties Book now a private party OUR Story Innovating for the lowcountry palate since 2013. Across the street from Minero and nestled in the corner of the shopping center on Maybank Highway in Johns Island, is an unassuming spot with a little something for everyone. Especially the hungry. Most of us are pretty familiar with the ins and outs of your average sandwich shop, however since 2013 The Southern General has been serving up the expected and much, much more. And trust us, it's well worth a taste. Read more about us Reviews Start stop reviews carousel Review by - Google Belynda L: five star review by We had the Cuban with house made chips and cucumber salad and everything was delicious! Fresh, tasty and large portions! So glad we found this little hidden spot and will definitely be back! Review by - Google Farah A: five star review by Visited Charleston for the first time and was recommended this place by a local while eating somewhere else. The chicken schnitzel was amazing. Staff was great. Review by - Google Josh B: five star review by I really enjoyed my visit. The food was awesome. The service was friendly. The place is very well taken care of. I highly recommend this place and will be bringing back my visitors during the summer. Review by - Google Greta V: five star review by One of the best sandwiches I've ever had. The combination of flavors and the tender pulled pork made the Super Butt a new tradition for me! Review by - Google Catalina P: five star review by First Time Eating there, Great and Tasty Food! Sesame Shrimp Sandwich with Cucumber Salad was a very delicious combination! Service was excellent, definitely recommend!
